casebody.data:
FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION, Petitioner, v. EDWIN CIGAR COMPANY, Inc., Respondent. SAME, Petitioner, v. JAMES B. HALL, Jr., Inc., Respondent. Nos. 99, 100. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 5, 1933. Robert E. Healy, Chief Counsel, Federal Trade Commission, and Martin A. Morrison, Asst. Chief Counsel, Federal Trade Commission, both of Washington, D. C., for petitioner. Bennett E. Siegelstein, of New York City (Perry Aussehnitt, of New York City, of counsel), for respondents'.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petitions granted in open court.
